Apoyan y promueven iniciativas que ayuda: They support and promote initiatives that help to conserve Cultural Heritage, encourage social dynamisation and enhance the image of the city to attract tourism and investment

Necesitan nuevas formas para mostrar su: They need new ways to showcase their talent, position themselves in the market, monetise their work
Exploran nuevos canales de adquisición q: They explore new acquisition channels that allow them to improve engagement with their brand. In addition, they are looking for communities committed to their values and are willing to commit to achieving their mission with them
Buscan experiencias inmersivas, de calid: They are looking for immersive, quality experiences. They also want to benefit from generating value from their digital identity and activity and are committed to making a positive impact on the world

mejorar la experiencia y la forma de rel: improve the way we interact with each other and with our environment.
La comunidad de Alvearium: The Alvearium community will lead the humanization of the metaverse through the use of the most disruptive technologies.

es una red social descentralizada en We: is a decentralized social network on Web3, with virtual spaces inspired by real cities, where users, thanks to immersive technologies, a tokenized ecosystem and rewards for consuming content on the platform, will create a Metaverse that generates a positive impact in the real world.
